name: Ataque Zombie
description:
Ataque Zombie is a command line game where you have to use bombs to escape from the zombies that chase you or run as fast as you can to the door to level up.

It is our first game developed entirely in C++ and we used ncurses library to create the CLI (command line interface).  It is libre software and the source code is available in our GitLab web page.

Controls:

  • Arrows to move
  • Space to put bombs
  • h to see the controls
  • q to quit

So have fun! and leave us a comment telling us to which level you’ve got. Also you can send us a screenshot from that level ;)

Found a bug? Send us an email telling us about it. -> Contact
